text: NASA’s Hubble Examines Cloud-9, First of New Type of Object - NASA Science (.gov)

text: Holocaust survivor Eva Schloss, the stepsister of Anne Frank, dies at 96 - NPR
fullText: Schloss, who was friends with Frank in Amsterdam and whose mother later married Frank's father, was a tireless educator about the Holocaust and was honorary president of The Anne Frank Trust UK.
